MS.S: A module for storing and reading configuration values, with full PS Data serialization, automatic configuration for modules and scripts, etc.
Copyright (c) 2014-2017 by Joel Bennett, all rights reserved.

v1.3.1: Use GetPureExpression().Value to support older versions of PowerShell_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_ v1.3.0: Bump version to hide 1.2 and justify the change to the save paths._x000D__x000A_ Rename Get-StoragePath to Get-ConfigurationPath (old name is aliased)_x000D__x000A_ v1.2.0: Add Support for Linux and MacOS_x000D__x000A_ Stop using `mkdir -Force` because it does not work on Linux_x000D__x000A_ Add default paths for posix systems based on XDG standards_x000D__x000A_ Add logic for overriding the default paths in the Manifest_x000D__x000A_ Fix a bug in PSObject serialization (from v1.1.1)_x000D__x000A_ Fix bug with special property names (like PSObject) caused by dot notation_x000D__x000A_ Fix tests so they run cross-platform_x000D__x000A_ ACCIDENTALLY changed default save paths:_x000D__x000A_ Using "powershell" instead of WindowsPowerShell (even in WindowsPowerShell)_x000D__x000A_ v1.1.0: Added support for ScriptBlocks and SwitchParameters_x000D__x000A_ Added support for serializing objects as hashtables
Copyright (c) 2014-2017 by Joel Bennett, all rights reserved.
A module for storing and reading configuration values, with full PS Data serialization, automatic configuration for modules and scripts, etc.

v1.3.1: Use GetPureExpression().Value to support older versions of PowerShell_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_ v1.3.0: Bump version to hide 1.2 and justify the change to the save paths._x000D__x000A_ Rename Get-StoragePath to Get-ConfigurationPath (old name is aliased)_x000D__x000A_ v1.2.0: Add Support for Linux and MacOS_x000D__x000A_ Stop using `mkdir -Force` because it does not work on Linux_x000D__x000A_ Add default paths for posix systems based on XDG standards_x000D__x000A_ Add logic for overriding the default paths in the Manifest_x000D__x000A_ Fix a bug in PSObject serialization (from v1.1.1)_x000D__x000A_ Fix bug with special property names (like PSObject) caused by dot notation_x000D__x000A_ Fix tests so they run cross-platform_x000D__x000A_ ACCIDENTALLY changed default save paths:_x000D__x000A_ Using "powershell" instead of WindowsPowerShell (even in WindowsPowerShell)_x000D__x000A_ v1.1.0: Added support for ScriptBlocks and SwitchParameters_x000D__x000A_ Added support for serializing objects as hashtables
